name: Internet Guardians
description:
Be a solo guardian or team up with a friend and protect the Internet together! In this shoot 'em up game you must protect the Internet from bugs that aim to corrupt it. Debug the cyberspace and recover Internet files to get an increased score and Internet medals!

Enemies will speed up and different bugs will join the scene chasing the Guardians as time passes by.

CONTROLS

Meet the Guardians

Be a solo guardian or team up with a friend and protect the Internet together!

Beware of the Bugs

Red Boggy will chase the Internet, while Green Boggy will chase the Guardians. But be careful! Both of them are capable of plaguing the Internet and the Guardian's ships with bugs! They will speed up and call on more enemies as time passes by. Eliminate them and protect yourself and your precious Internet!

Get an increased score

Recover the Internet files and be rewarded with an increase in your score

Earn Internet Medals

Protect the Internet and receive Internet Medals based on your score!
